_instructions.1_where_to_save: Save this as: C:\Users\YourName\.factory\config.json (or ~/.factory/config.json in Git Bash)
_instructions.2_customize: Remove models you don't need or add more from your VibeProxy providers

3_base_url_rules.gemini_models: Use http://localhost:8317/v1 if authenticated in VibeProxy
3_base_url_rules.qwen_models: Use http://localhost:8317/v1 if authenticated in VibeProxy

_instructions.4_api_key: Always use 'dummy-not-used' - VibeProxy handles authentication via OAuth
_instructions.5_tunnel_required: Ensure ssh-tunnel-vibeproxy.ps1 is running before using Factory Droid!
_instructions.6_verify_providers: Check VibeProxy menu bar app on Mac - providers must show 'Connected âœ…'
